title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Social Leadership Development Through Simulated Patient Scenarios

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can perform realistic situational judgments at least three times in simulated patient environments
Learners can present leadership strategies improved by more than 80% during peer evaluations based on simulation feedback
Learners can materialize solutions to real organizational problems by leveraging simulation experiences in PBL team activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
